auth.onboarding2DescriptionToFunctionAndroid: To function, Boostr will need access to data in your Google Fit. Data on steps and distance run, walked or cycled will be important within Boostr
auth.onboarding2DescriptionToFunctionIos: To function, Boostr will need access to data in your Apple Health. Data on steps and distance run, walked or cycled will be important within Boostr
auth.onboarding2DescriptionWhichOf: Which of these activities do you currently do?*
auth.onboarding2DescriptionYesAllow: Yes, allow push notifications to encourage me and alert me to invitations
auth.onboarding2DescriptionYesMake: Yes, make my profile visible to my co-workers
auth.onboarding2DescriptionYesSend: Yes, send me offers and information from marketing partners
auth.onboarding2DescriptionYourNickName: *Your nickname will identify you to your co-workers. Your nickname can be anything you like and can be changed at any time.
auth.onboarding3DescriptionText4: Dive into health, fitness, nutrition content
auth.onboarding4DescriptionText: Across your navigation bar you’ll see the Home icon, Challenges, Tracker, Teams and Rewards. More is available to you in the burger menu.
auth.onboarding5DescriptionText: You’re ready to go. Boostr will automatically track your Steps (or Pushes). Your home page will show you your weekly Steps Goal and progress towards it. You’ll also see any invitations you have received from your co-workers.
auth.otpSent: Otp sent on your registered email
auth.passwordValidation: Password must be a minimum of 8 characters including number, Upper, Lower And one special character
auth.reactivated: Your account is reactivated, please login to continue!
auth.registerTermsTextPart1: By clicking Create Account, you agree to our

auth.welcomeToDescriptionText: Welcome to Boostr and your journey towards a happier, healthier and better-connected workplace. Whatever your current level of fitness, Boostr will connect you and your co-workers and motivate you into action turning workmates into teammates and deadlines to finish lines.

myChallenges.challengeDescription: Challenge. Come on, you can do it! Remember, you can run, wheel, or walk your way to the finish line.
myChallenges.chooseOwnDistance: None of the above? Choose your own distance.
myChallenges.createFarOutDescription1: Who can travel the farthest in the given time?
myChallenges.createFarOutDescription2: You decide the activity and set the time frame.
myChallenges.createFarOutDescription3: Track your distance on a live leaderboard.
myChallenges.createHappyFeetDescription1: Set yourself and each individual the same distance and time frame.
myChallenges.createHappyFeetDescription2: Can you each run, wheel or walk a marathon in the next month? Want to take on the Seven Summits Challenge and walk up the world’s highest mountains together?
myChallenges.createMeetUpDescription1: Time for a lunch time walk or run together with co-workers?
myChallenges.createMeetUpDescription2: You name the place, time and distance.
myChallenges.createMeetUpDescription3: Who wants to join you there? If you’re interested in timing then use Boostr’s In-App Tracker and see your times posted on a leaderboard.
myChallenges.createRelayDescription1: You decide the type of activity, set the distance and time frame.
myChallenges.createRelayDescription2: Collectively cycle 100km or run a marathon? The distance is up to you. Choose one of the pre-set distances or create your own.
myChallenges.createRelayDescription3: Invite co-workers and track progress on a live leaderboard.
myChallenges.createTimeTrailDescription1: You choose the activity, is it to run/wheel or cycle?
myChallenges.createTimeTrailDescription2: Choose the distance (e.g. 5 km run or 50 miles bike ride).
myChallenges.createTimeTrailDescription3: Who can run or bike the fastest over the set distance? Who’s the Champ?
myChallenges.createTimeTrailDescription4: Time yourself on Boostr’s In-App Tracker and see your personal best / fastest split listed on a live leaderboard.
myChallenges.deleteChallengeDescription: Deletion will mean that the Challenge will disappear from Boostr and no-one will be able to contribute to the Challenge from this point forward.
myChallenges.deleteChallengeTitle: Are you sure you want to delete this Challenge?
myChallenges.farOutIntro: You’re in the right place to create new Challenges and to invite your co-workers. There are five types of Challenges to choose from:
myChallenges.farOutSubText2: Who can travel the farthest in the given time. Track your distance on a live leaderboard?
myChallenges.happyFeetIntro: You’re in the right place to create new Challenges and to invite your co-workers. There are five types of Challenges to choose from:
myChallenges.happyFeetSubText1: Set each individual’s distance and time frame.
myChallenges.happyFeetSubText2: Can you each run/walk a marathon in the next month?
myChallenges.leaveChallengeDescription: You'll no longer be able to contribute to the Challenge but all your contributions up until today will remain.
myChallenges.leaveChallengeTitle: Are you sure you want to leave this Challenge?
myChallenges.meetUpIntro: You’re in the right place to create new Challenges and to invite your co-workers. There are five types of Challenges to choose from:
myChallenges.meetUpSubText1: Name the place, time and distance.
myChallenges.meetUpSubText2: Who wants to join you there? Time for a lunch time run or walk together?
myChallenges.name: Name
myChallenges.noChallengeDetails: Not able to fetch the challenge details now, please try after some time!
myChallenges.noChallengesInvites: No invites available, Other users can invite you and details will be shown here!
myChallenges.noLiveChallenges: No challenges available, You can create a challenge or join the invited challenges
myChallenges.relayChallengeDescription: Challenge. Come on, you can do it!
myChallenges.relayChallengeIntro: You’re in the right place to create new Challenges and to invite your co-workers. There are five types of Challenges to choose from:
myChallenges.relayChallengeSubText1: Set the collective distance and time frame.
myChallenges.relayChallengeSubText2: Collectively cycle 100 km or run 100 miles? The distance is up to you
myChallenges.sendBoostrDescription: Send messages, photos or videos to others on the challenge
myChallenges.timeTrialChallengeDescription: , get out there and set a new PB! See who you can overtake.
myChallenges.timeTrialIntro: You’re in the right place to create new Challenges and to invite your co-workers. There are five types of Challenges to choose from:
myChallenges.timeTrialSubText2: Who can run or bike the fastest over the set distance? Who’s the Champ?
myChallenges.title: My Challenges

teams.comeJoinTeamBoostr: Come and join our Team on Boostr!
teams.joinTeamDescription: You're invited! Choose from amongst these Teams that are open for you to join. Tap on the team to see the Team Profile and from there you can send a message that you want to join.
teams.leaveTeamHeader: Are you sure you want to leave the Team?
teams.leaveTeamHeaderDescription: Once you leave the Team you'll no longer be able to see yourself on the Leaderboard, engage in Team Chat or share in Team Challenges.
teams.noTeamsInvites: No team invites available, Other users can invite you and details will be shown here!
teams.sendChatDescription: Tap here to send a message to your Teammates.
